label: 土倉方一集
本: The Moneylenders of Late Medieval Kyoto . University of Hawai'i Press . 2001
見出し読み: どそうかたいっしゅう
説明文: [MS:  Dosōkata isshū was the word used by the shogunate in reference to the moneylenders as a group after the shogunate became another overlord of the moneylenders, nominally protecting them from such abuses as arbitrary taxation in return for monthly taxes.]
